features: Improved stability: The new ADV-C Chassis targets articulations on the outer foot to optimize stability without limiting your mobility
All-terrain grip: The Contagrip® MA outsole grabs the terrain, even when it’s wet or slippery, giving you more control especially on descents
Women-specific: With softer materials, especially around the collar and heel, a lower-density chassis and women-specific last, this shoe is designed for your feet

Contagrip® MA: Contagrip® MA is built for the widest variety of surfaces. It balances both the geometry and the rubber compound to deliver confidence on wet, dry, hard or loose surfaces, and offer long-term durability
ADV-C Chassis: Protecting ankle articulations on the outer foot, this chassis provides extra stability while also keeping the front of the shoe flexible for a more fluid ride
